医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
初级保健提供者可能是加速提供新兴阿尔茨海默病治疗的关键一项新的研究表明，美国医疗保健系统在诊断和使用疾病缓解疗法治疗早期阿尔茨海默病方面存在很大的地理差异，让初级保健提供者参与这一工作可能是加速提供新兴新疗法的关键兰德报告。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Primary-care-providers-may-be-the-key-to-acceleating-delivery-of-emerging-Alzheimers-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Primary-care-providers-may-be-the-key-to-acceleating-delivery-of-emerging-Alzheimers-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c187285-dc18-41aa-a152-fe2abfceea89 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 17:12:02 -0500 Primary care providers may be the key to accelerating delivery of emerging Alzheimer's treatments
剑桥科学家发现禁食如何成为人体天然的炎症对抗剂剑桥大学的科学家可能发现了一种新方法，可以通过禁食帮助减少炎症——这是人体免疫系统潜在的破坏性副作用，是许多慢性疾病的根源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Cambridge-scientists-discover-how-fasting-turns-up-the-bodys-natural-inflammation-fighter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Cambridge-scientists-discover-how-fasting-turns-up-the-bodys-natural-inflammation-fighter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f2fa5c7-cf2e-4814-9066-434b7665eb9b Tue, 30 Jan 2024 17:02:30 -0500 Cambridge scientists discover how fasting turns up the body's natural inflammation fighter
自然行走增强大脑中的某些执行控制过程犹他大学心理学研究人员的新研究正在帮助证明美国作家约翰·缪尔和亨利·大卫·梭罗在 150 多年前试图教导的内容：花在大自然中的时间对心灵和灵魂都有好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Nature-walk-enhances-certain-executive-control-processes-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Nature-walk-enhances-certain-executive-control-processes-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5613483-a41c-4cf1-9800-7e4eb3bc9372 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 16:59:00 -0500 Nature walk enhances certain executive control processes in the brain
基因蓝图揭晓：甲状腺癌耐药和转化的新见解2024 年 1 月 24 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一项新的研究观点，题为“甲状腺癌的遗传改变介导对 BRAF 抑制和间变性转化的抵抗”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Genetic-blueprint-revealed-New-insights-into-甲状腺-cancers-resistance-and-transformation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Genetic-blueprint-revealed-New-insights-into-甲状腺-cancers-resistance-and-transformation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f034487-574a-463c-9a08-33cc6ac6be69 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 16:53:25 -0500 Genetic blueprint revealed: New insights into thyroid cancer's resistance and transformation
“僵尸”病毒碎片引发炎症，导致严重的 COVID-19 后果COVID-19 大流行有许多挥之不去的谜团。例如，为什么导致疾病的病毒 SARS-CoV-2 会导致一些患者出现严重症状，而许多其他冠状病毒却不会？即使感染已从人体系统中清除，是什么导致奇怪的症状仍然存在？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Zombie-viral-fragments-trigger-inflammation-to-cause-serious-COVID-19-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Zombie-viral-fragments-trigger-inflammation-to-cause-serious-COVID-19-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fe0e08a-b2de-4819-8191-47e53c2ce5d4 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 16:49:35 -0500 "Zombie" viral fragments trigger inflammation to cause serious COVID-19 outcomes
nirsevimab 免疫接种对卢森堡儿科 RSV 相关住院治疗的影响呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 是导致全世界幼儿住院的主要原因之一，每年估计有 101,000 名 5 岁以下儿童因 RSV 感染而死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Impact-of-nirsevimab-immunization-on-pediatric-RSV-lated-hospitalizations-in-Luxembourg.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Impact-of-nirsevimab-immunization-on-pediatric-RSV-lated-hospitalizations-in-Luxembourg.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=519ba837-763d-4341-96fc-0e15ea647189 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 16:40:31 -0500 Impact of nirsevimab immunization on pediatric RSV-related hospitalizations in Luxembourg
学校护士可能能够很好地识别有长期缺勤风险的学生学校护士不仅仅是医疗保健英雄。它们还在识别有长期缺勤风险的学生方面发挥着关键作用；这是一个日益严重的问题，它会降低学业成功率，损害学生的健康，并导致各种负面的长期生活结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/School-nurses-may-be-well-positioned-to-identify-students-at-risk-for-chronic-absenteeism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/School-nurses-may-be-well-positioned-to-identify-students-at-risk-for-chronic-absenteeism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0024318c-acf3-44e5-9b10-33b0cc6a7bf6 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 16:34:38 -0500 School nurses may be well-positioned to identify students at-risk for chronic absenteeism
通过虚拟就诊实现公平：远程医疗彻底改变了医疗补助受益者的高血压护理同行评审期刊《远程医疗和电子健康》上的一项新研究发现，在 COVID-19 大流行期间，无论种族和民族，医疗补助受益者通过远程医疗进行高血压管理的人数有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Equity-through-virtual-visits-Telehealth-revolutionizes-hypertension-care-for-Medicaid-recipients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Equity-through-virtual-visits-Telehealth-revolutionizes-hypertension-care-for-Medicaid-recipients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1116819-4864-4aa2-8a6c-3d1f71fcf5fc Tue, 30 Jan 2024 16:29:03 -0500 Equity through virtual visits: Telehealth revolutionizes hypertension care for Medicaid recipients
DiAL-Health 研究旨在确定限时饮食如何延缓衰老并延长“健康寿命”一月是许多人寻找新饮食习惯的时期，间歇性禁食和传统的卡路里削减计划正在流行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/DiAL-Health-study-aims-to-define-how-time-restricted-eating-can-slow-aging-and-improve-healthspan.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/DiAL-Health-study-aims-to-define-how-time-restricted-eating-can-slow-aging-and-improve-healthspan.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8b746a5-afa6-4152-a0ff-24ecdfa3f38a Tue, 30 Jan 2024 16:22:55 -0500 DiAL-Health study aims to determine how time-restricted eating can slow aging and improve 'healthspan'
克服耻辱，开始有关认知衰退的早期对话大约五分之四的初级保健临床医生认为自己处于大脑健康的第一线。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Overcoming-stigma-to-start-early-conversations-about-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240130/Overcoming-stigma-to-start-early-conversations-about-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8ce5b76-fee4-4800-8637-2303248b8181 Tue, 30 Jan 2024 16:18:19 -0500 Overcoming stigma to start early conversations about cognitive decline
